intro: Microtoena vanchingshanensis, commonly known as the Vanchingshan microtoena, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its small, delicate leaves and clustered flowers. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments within mountainous regions. Its botanical features include ascending stems and small, white to pale yellow flowers. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
